text_prompt:
Create an image following the given description: 
It is an extreme close-up on a patch of desiccated earth in the foreground. A single IRON SHOVEL, covered in dust, is partially visible, scraping the soil. A single SKELETAL HAND, referencing the hands from Image 0 and Image 1 for appearance, is gripping the soil. The lighting is harsh daylight with a sickly GREEN LIGHT visible flickering ominously on the distant horizon. The background should suggest a battlefield edge, inspired by the environment in Image 0.
